name: Drone
attack2: Deal 20 damage and draw a card

name: Scout
attack2: Deal 20 damage. Flip a coin: if heads, deal 20 damage to an adjacent Lane

name: Sentinel
attack1: Draw a card. Flip a coin 3 times: for each heads, deal 10 damage
attack2: Deal 30 damage. Flip a coin: if heads, draw 3 cards

name: Enforcer
attack1: Deal 20 damage. Flip a coin: if heads, deal 20 damage to any Lane

name: Golem
attack1: Deal 40 damage. Flip a coin: if heads, return a card from your discard pile to your hand
attack2: Deal 40 damage. Take a card from the Market and put it on top of your deck

name: Armor Plating
component: Overdrive: Repair 20 damage from attached Scrapbot. Flip a coin, if heads, repair an additional 20 damage

name: Chainsaw
component: Overdrive: Deal 30 damage. Deal 10 damage to each adjacent lane

name: Fusion Cannon
component: Overdrive: Flip a coin 3 times. For each heads, deal 10 damage to every Lane

name: Repair Crew
tactic: Repair 20 damage from each of your Scrapbots

name: Smash & Grab
tactic: Reveal the top card of the Scrap deck then place it on top of your deck

name: Power Surge
tactic: Choose one of your Scrapbots. Ready and attack with it. Flip a coin: if heads, repeat this card's effect with the chosen Scrapbot.

name: Teleport
tactic: Ready each of your Scrapbots. You may move any of your Scrapbots into an empty Lane

name: Head Trauma
wound: During your draw phase: Discard all Wound cards and draw 2 cards for each Wound discarded this way. This can only occur once per turn
